data.text: @testp7seven Hi, we would advise you to carry the same with you in your check-in luggage on your domestic flight. ~Yashica
@Khandelwal_mk24 Mr Khandelwal, we request you to kindly share with us your PNR over DM so we can communicate with our airport team to look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AshishPuma Mr Sethi, we request you to DM us your PNR so we can assist you in a better way. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@divatarasha Ma'am, this does not sound right. We request you to kindly share with us your PNR over DM so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@VrandeshSharma You can indeed carry a 30,000 mAh power bank on domestic flights with you in your hand luggage. ~Yashica
@Anshumali_007 Hi, please DM us your PNR so we can check and assist you in a better way. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Priyasingh967 Ma'am, please DM the PNR so we may check on it. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@jainayushhh Sir, as checked, the booking is confirmed with us. Please reach out to the travel agency for assistance. ~Shreya

@RjDhvanit Mr Thaker, we understand the disappointment when the baggage doesn't arrive with you. We have just learned that the baggage has been connected and will be delivered to you soon. We truly regret any inconvenience in the meantime. ~Kritika
@jena5_sonukumar Sir, please allow us some time to get this checked. ~Ojasvi

@YatraTime Hi, we believe our customer relations team is in touch with you over email. We request you kindly revert to the same trail mail for further assistance. Should you require further support, we are only a DM away. ~Ojasvi

data.text: @PandeyVibhow Yes. ~Shreya
@Namit85121818 Sir, please share your contact details and PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@CgtvnewsRavi Please DM the transaction details so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@halfcry__ Hi, you may carry your Whey Protein in both check-in as well as hand baggage. ~Ojasvi

@VickyNandi Sir, this doesn't sound right. We shall get this checked. Rude behavior is completely unacceptable hence, your feedback will be shared with the concerned team for staff briefing to avoid such instances in the future. Hope to serve you a better experience next time.~Vaishali
@Namit85121818 Sir, the charges are only for preferred seat selection. You may opt for auto-assign seats during web check-in to avoid any charges. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @Sathya43012042 Sir, may we request you to please visit https://t.co/csj0lHIsLU & refer to 'Flying into India: State-wise guidelines' for comprehensive information related to international travel guidelines. ~Shreya
@SAMT100 Sure, our team will connect with you for further update. ~Shreya

@MALAYGANGOPADH1 Hi, one of our representatives tried connecting with you, however, the call could not be connected. Please share an alternate number and a suitable time via DM so we may assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@saptarshinath Sir, we do accept international credit cards. Please DM us your contact number so we may assist you at the earliest.

data.text:
@victorsalter Sir, we regret the experience. Our crew is expected to be courteous all the time. Could you please share the PNR via DM so we may share the feedback for review and avoid such instances in the future?~Shreya
  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@CgtvnewsRavi Sir, we have received one PNR under the mentioned email ID but it has different passenger name. Please share the correct booking details so we may share the same. ~Shreya
@AlihayderP Sir, we regret the discomfort. We'll share the feedback with the team. Hope on serve better in future. ~Shreya

@sidhaivam Sir, we're concerned to note your disappointment. Our crew is expected to be courteous all the time. Could you please share the PNR and details via DM so we may share the feedback for review and avoid such instances in the future?~Vaishali

@shreephadke @Rakeshkpatro007 Sir, we work hard to keep our flight clean and insect free. We hope you'll understand that insects cannot be completely guarded against and we can't fumigate when passengers are on board. We'll make sure to pass on your feedback.  ~Ojasvi

@Anshika13011996 Sir, a full refund has been processed to the primary mode of payment on the 1st of November, 2022. Please visit https://t.co/m513NEgQJu to track your refund status. We request you get in touch with the relevant travel agency for further clarification. ~Ojasvi
@muditpant29 Sir, we request your transaction ID via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@bintblah Hi, Aadhar card can be used as a valid ID. ~Ojasvi
@maddhurvade Hi, we are concerned to know this. Please DM us your concern in detail so we may check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@ImPushkarS Hi, we request you to share your concern in detail via DM so we may assist.~Vaishali
@NissySagar Hi, we're concerned to know this. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali

@IamNagesh21 Sir, please note that IndiGo never charges any fee for selection/training from potential candidates. Further, we have noted your feedback. You may visit https://t.co/sqVBx8d70E to know the latest job opportunities. ~Ojasvi
@gujralr Mr Gujral, we are concerned to know what went wrong. Please DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR so we may check and assist you. ~Ojasvi

@Imteyazkhan_dbg Sir, we regret that your flight is missed. Please be informed check-in counter closes 75 minutes prior and the boarding gate closes 25 minutes prior to the departure. We hope for your understanding in this regard. Further, your feedback will be shared with the team. ~Vaishali
@asarkar15 Sir, we believe one of our representatives addressed your concern and assisted you in the best possible way. ~Ojasvi

@richabansal Ma'am, we work hard to keep our flight clean and insect free. We hope you'll understand that insects cannot be completely guarded against and we can't fumigate when passengers are on board. We'll make sure to pass on your feedback. ~Ojasvi
@dasanupkr Sir, we regret the experience. The boarding pass is sent to the registered email ID 12-6 hours prior to the departure. However, we'll share your feedback with the concerned team. ~Ojasvi

Say hello to our 75th domestic destination, Donyi Polo Airport, Itanagar. Bookings now open. #goIndiGo #NewDestination #Itanagar #ArunachalPradesh #IndiaAt75

@MoCA_GoI @JM_Scindia @PemaKhanduBJP @AAI_Official https://t.co/fHUsgo87SA

@rahulsyngg Sir, we regret to note your disappointment. For the corporate meal, a complimentary snack and beverage is provided as per the availability onboard. However, we have certainly taken note of your feedback. ~Vaishali

@sonveer_poniya Sir, we are concerned to know about the issue. Please share the details with us along with the PNR via DM. We wish to check and assist you.~Vaishali
@kumarrajnish88 We believe our team has contacted and addressed your concern. ~Shreya

@sureshtodi Sir, we're concerned to know about this. Rude behavior is not at all accepted. We'll share the feedback with the relevant department for review and necessary staff briefing to avoid such instances in the future. ~Ojasvi
@khandelwalheena Hi, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we shall get back to you with an update soon. ~Ojasvi

@suparna1gn Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience. We request you to share the transaction ID, email id, and contact number via DM so we may get it checked. We will get back to you with an update.~Vaishali  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SAMT100 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@deeghosh Hi, this doesn't look right to us. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we may look into it. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @anirudh_bh Mr Bhatnagar, we regret the inconvenience and request you to visit Plan B: https://t.co/7emkcWraSb to opt for an Alternate Flight or Full Refund. Do let us know via DM in case you face any issues. ~Ojasvi
@AgileTechGuru This means a lot. 💙 Thank you for choosing to fly with us, Mr Raghupathy. ~Linda
@Kazerkami3 Sir, this doesn't look right to us. Please help us with your PNR as well as a copy of your PIR issued by the arrival airport via DM so we may look into it. ~Ojasvi
@aakankshaup Hello, please share your concern via DM. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@asarkar15 Sir, we will connect with you in a while for assistance in this regard. Thanks.~Vaishali
@SahilPathankhan Sir, we regret the damage. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will get back to you.~Vaishali
@ramanjeet369 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may raise it with the team to check and expedite.~Vaishali
@aditya2day Hi, we believe you have received the baby perambulator by now. ~Linda

@mayankktrivedyy Mr Tiwari, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please be informed, proper and valid ID card as per the ticket is needed to be carried, for checking and boarding the aircraft, due to security reasons. ~Diyashi

@Andy_RedDevil07 Hi, we try our best to not make any changes in the flight schedule. However, given the nature of our operation certain unanticipated schedule changes become inevitable & is beyond our control. We look forward to your kind understanding. ~Linda

@kareenarachel Hi, thank you for meeting our airport team. We hope they were able to address this. Through our fast-forward service, we ensure a faster than standard check-in time and regret any wait you had to experience the other day. Hope to serve you better on a future flight soon. ~Prabh
@rockyandmayur Well said, Mayur. Some firsts are always special. May you continue to experience such pleasant surprises. Hope you had a fab flight 😊💙 ~Prabh
@SN197382 Mr Nair, please know that, we have raised the issue to concerned team, hoping to serve you better next time. ~Diyashi.
@JivapackSales Hi, we would like to have a closer look into this matter. Please help us with your PNR via DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@aakankshaup Hello, how we may assist you? ~Diyashi

@sindhuhTOI Ms Hariharan, we appreciate you taking the time to meet our team. Be assured, your feedback is important to us and will be shared internally which will help us serve you better in the coming days. ~Linda

@DhruvCourse1 Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused. 1st time travels are always valuable, we never intended to provide such an experience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Rakeshk86040561 Mr Kumar, we shall share the details with the concerned team and allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@piyushsdaga Mr Daga, please allow us some time while we get this checked with the concerned team. We will get back to you with an update at the earliest. ~Sheetal

@rohitbose9029 Mr Bose, we truely regret the inconvenience and the delayed response. As checked one of our representative tried connecting with you. But the calls went unanswered. Please share a suitable time to connect with you. ~Diyashi

@Monjurultech Hi, you are allowed to bring food items on board. Allowed food items include cold snacks, non-alcoholic drinks, snack bars, and biscuits. However, any kind of messy, oily, or strong-smelling food item is not allowed on-board. Hope this clarifies. ~Sheetal

data.text: @divya_shah23 Ms Shah, thank you for flying with us every time. We shall raise the feedback to the concerned team. You may check the 6E rewards program by clicking at https://t.co/YRoUdrhllA . Thank you. ~Diyashi
@MamtaJha96 Ms Jha, what happened? Please share your experience in detail via DM so we may have a closer look into it. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

urls.title: FAQs About Unaccompanied Minor Travel - IndiGo
urls.description: Who is considered an Unaccompanied Minor? Get help with unaccompanied minor/ child travel related frequently asked questions. Learn more at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @newabhivictory Sir, please visit https://t.co/34DNZFPTjo for your reference. You may also share your contact details so we may assist you with this. Thank you! ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@JonathanVeerak1 Sir, we truly regret the experience you had with us. Please help us with your transaction details along with the registered email address & contact number via DM so we may check and resolve this as soon as possible. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@DarMurli Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please know we have raised the feedback to the concerned team. ~Diyashi

@PriyamvadaKhil4 Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused to you. We never intend to provide such experiences. Please share your PNR via DM so we check and proceed further with the concern. ~Diyashi   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@euphoriakabir Hello, could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@drishudew Sir, you may carry the mentioned item in your baggage along with the prescription (if any) to avoid any last-minute hassle. ~Sheetal
@rishi82in Sir, it was never our intention to cause hassle. We believe the passengers have boarded the flight successfully. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Prahlad
@vkgunjan Sir, we believe one of our representatives addressed your concern via call and assisted you in the best possible way. ~Prahlad

@PrsSrng Hi, please DM us your registered email ID along with the snapshot of the transaction details displaying the transaction ID, date & time of transaction so we can check & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@MsShrutiSharma Ms Sharma, we regret the experience. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Aditya63321930 Hi, your flight will land in Delhi T3 & your connecting flight will take off from Delhi T1. ~Linda
@aditya_srimal Sir, as checked, our customer relations team has replied to you in this regard. Please check and revert accordingly. Thanks. ~Prahlad

@naineshbjp Mr Shah, we tried calling you, however, we were unable to connect on the registered number. Please DM us an alternate number and a good time to speak with you. ~Prabh   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@BoredCricket Mr Sethi, we regret such an experience. We advise customers to prebook wheelchair at least 48 hrs prior to ensure smooth travels. We've now added the wheelchair for both the flights and our staff will assist her in the best way. ~Prabh
